data.text: When this card enters your Stable, SACRIFICE a Unicorn card. If this card is in your Stable at the beginning of your turn, you may SACRIFICE an Upgrade card in your Stable, then DESTROY 2 Unicorn cards.
data.name: The Reaper Unicorn

data.text: Choose any player. Return all cards in that player's Stable to that player's hand, then immediately bring the same cards directly into that player's Stable.
data.name: Time Rift

data.text: When this card enters your Stable, SACRIFICE 2 cards. If this card is in your Stable at the beginning of your turn, you may look at the top 3 cards of the deck, then return them in any order.
data.name: Time-Shifting Unicorn

data.text: Each time you play a Unicorn card from your hand, DISCARD a card.
data.name: Tollbooth

data.text: DRAW a card, then play 2 cards from your hand. Skip your next turn.
data.name: Totally Not Two Unicorns

data.text: If this card is in your Stable at the beginning of your turn, you may move an Upgrade or Downgrade card from any player's Stable to any other player's Stable. If you do, skip your Action phase.
data.name: Traffic Director Unicorn

data.text: Play this card when any other player tries to DRAW a card. Stop that player from drawing the card. That player must DISCARD a card instead.
data.name: Trapped Chest

data.text: When any other player plays a Unicorn card, you may SACRIFICE this card. If you do, STEAL that Unicorn card.
data.name: Trojan Unicorn

data.text: If this card is in your Stable at the beginning of your turn, you may DISCARD a card. If you do, play 2 cards during your Action phase.
data.name: Twin Unicorns

data.text: If this card is in your Stable at the beginning of your turn, shuffle a Unicorn card from your Stable into the deck, then DRAW a card. If at any time you have no Unicorn cards in your Stable, SACRIFICE this card.
data.name: Unicorn Abduction

data.text: If you have two or more Basic Unicorn cards in your Stable at the beginning of your turn, you may DISCARD a card. If you do, bring a Baby Unicorn card from the Nursery directly into your Stable.
data.name: Unicorn Adoption Agency

data.text: Choose any other player and look at that player's hand. Choose 2 cards from that player's hand and add them to your hand. That player may look at your hand and choose a card from it to add to their hand. That player may not choose either card you chose.
data.name: Unicorn Black Market

data.text: If one of your Unicorn cards would be sacrificed or destroyed, you may SACRIFICE an Upgrade or Downgrade card instead.
data.name: Unicorn Bribe

data.text: If this card is in your Stable at the beginning of your turn, you may DISCARD 2 cards. If you do, SACRIFICE or DESTROY a card.
data.name: Unicorn Mafia

data.text: When this card enters your Stable, you may DESTROY a Unicorn card. If this card would be destroyed by any other player's card, that player may STEAL it instead.
data.name: Unicorn of Betrayal

data.text: If this card is in your Stable at the beginning of your turn, you may DRAW an extra card. If you do, each other player may DRAW a card.
data.name: Unicorn of Charity

data.text: When this card enters your Stable, SACRIFICE a Unicorn card. If one of your Unicorn cards would be destroyed, you may SACRIFICE an Upgrade or Downgrade card instead.
data.name: Unicorn of Conniving Artistry

data.text: When this card enters your Stable, SACRIFICE a Unicorn card. When any player plays an Upgrade card in their Stable, you may DISCARD a card. If you do, search the deck for a Downgrade card and bring it directly into that player's Stable. Shuffle the deck.
data.name: Unicorn of Foreboding Doom

data.text: When this card enters your Stable, DISCARD a card. When any other player plays a Downgrade card in your Stable, search the deck for an Upgrade card and bring it directly into your Stable. Shuffle the deck.
data.name: Unicorn of Glory

data.text: When this card enters your Stable, DISCARD 2 cards. If this card is in your Stable at the beginning of your turn, each other player must DISCARD a card.
data.name: Unicorn of Misfortune

data.text: If this card is in your Stable at the beginning of your turn, you may look at the top 2 cards of the deck and return them in the same order.
data.name: Unicorn Prophet

data.text: Each time you DRAW a least 1 card, DISCARD a card.
data.name: Unicorn Tax

data.text: "We're not lost! We're on an adventure!"
data.name: Unicorn Tourist

data.text: STEAL a Unicorn card.
data.name: Unicorn Trap

data.text: When this card enters your Stable, you may DISCARD a card. If you do, bring a DOWNGRADE card from your hand directly into any player's Stable.
data.name: Unicorn Trap Master

data.text: Shuffle the discard pile into the deck. Search the deck for a Unicorn card and bring that card directly into your Stable. Each other player may DRAW a card. Shuffle the deck.
data.name: Unicorns Forever

data.text: DRAW cards until you reach your hand limit. Each other player may DRAW 2 cards.
data.name: Unicornucopia

data.text: Play this card when any other player tries to play a card. Stop that card from coming into play, then add it to the top of the deck.
data.name: Unwind and Rewind

data.text: When this card enters your Stable, SACRIFICE a Unicorn card. If this card is in your Stable at the beginning of your turn, you may SACRIFICE a Unicorn card. If you do, bring a Unicorn card from the discard pile directly into your Stable.
data.name: Valkyrie Unicorn

data.text: Hold the relish!
data.name: Weeniecorn

data.text: DISCARD a card, then DRAW 3 cards.
data.name: Wishing Well

data.text: This card cannot be Neigh'd.
data.name: Wrecking Ball Unicorn

data.text: STEAL an Upgrade or Downgrade card.
data.name: Yoink!

data.text: If this card is in your Stable at the beginning of your turn, you may DISCARD 2 cards. If you do, you may choose to either DESTROY a Unicorn card OR search the deck for a Unicorn card and add it to your hand.
data.name: Controlled Chaos

data.text: DESTROY a card in any player's Stable without triggering any of it's triggered effects.
data.name: Controlled Destruction

data.text: Insert corny pun here.
data.name: Corn On The Cob

data.text: If this card would be sacrificed, destroyed, or returned to your hand, return it to the Nursery instead.
data.name: Demonic Baby Unicorn

data.text: Play this card with any other player tries to play an Upgrade or Downgrade card. Choose the Stable that card enters.
data.name: Destabilize

data.text: When this card enters your Stable, you may return all Baby Unicorn cards in each player's Stable to the Nursery.
data.name: Dingocorn

data.text: Each time a player would DISCARD a card, that player must DISCARD 2 cards instead.
data.name: Dread Pirate Unicorn

data.text: When this card enters your Stable, SACRIFICE 2 Unicorn cards. No other player may play Neigh cards. This card cannot be Neigh'd.
data.name: Elusive Oceloticorn

data.text: When this card enters your Stable, SACRIFICE 2 Unicorn cards. Each time you DESTROY a card, you may DESTROY a second card.
data.name: Epic Level Unicorn

data.text: When this card enters your Stable, you may DISCARD a card. If you do, bring an UPGRADE card from your hand directly into your Stable.
data.name: Excited Sealicorn

data.text: If this card is in your Stable at the beginning of your turn, you may DISCARD 2 cards. If you do, SACRIFICE or DESTROY a card.
data.name: Extra Life

data.text: If this card is in your Stable at the beginning of your turn, you may look at the top 3 cards of the deck. If you do, add one of them to your hand, then shuffle the other 2 back into the deck and skip your Draw phase.
data.name: Foresight

data.text: When this card enters your Stable, you may look at the top 3 cards of the deck. Move any number of those cards to the discard pile, then return the rest to the top of the deck in any order.
data.name: Fortune Teller Unicorn

data.text: When this card enters your Stable, you may choose any player. That player must shuffle their hand into the deck, then DRAW 3 cards.
data.name: Foxicorn

data.text: When this card enters your Stable, DISCARD a card. When any other player tries to play a card, you may SACRIFICE this card. If you do, add that card to your hand instead, then immediately play it.
data.name: Frankencorn

data.text: When this card enters your Stable, DISCARD your hand. If this card is in your Stable at the beginning of your turn, you may DRAW an extra card. Your hand limit increases by 3 cards.
data.name: Game Master Unicorn

data.text: Each time a Downgrade card enters your Stable, you may search for an Upgrade card and bring it directly into your Stable.
data.name: Glass Half Full

data.text: When this card enters your Stable, you may search the deck for an Upgrade card and bring it directly into your Stable. If you do, each other player may DRAW a card. Shuffle the deck.
data.name: Goldren Retrievercorn

data.text: If this card is in your Stable at the beginning of your turn, you may DISCARD 3 cards. If you do, SACRIFICE this card. If you don't, move a Unicorn card from your Stable to any other player's Stable.
data.name: Greener Pastures

data.text: SACRIFICE a Baby Unicorn card, then search the deck for a Unicorn card and bring it directly into your Stable.
data.name: Grow Up

data.text: When any other player tries to trigger a Unicorn card effect, you may DISCARD a card. If you do, stop that effect from triggering.
data.name: Hypnocorn

data.text: If you have a Baby Unicorn card in your Stable, you need 1 fewer Unicorn to win.
data.name: Imaginary Friendicorn

data.text: Play this card when any other player tries to play a Unicorn card. Bring a Basic Unicorn card from your hand directly into your Stable.
data.name: Imitation

data.text: Play this card when any other player tries to SACRIFICE a card. Stop the sacrifice effect and choose any player. SACRIFICE or DESTROY a card in that player's Stable.
data.name: Intervention

data.text: DISCARD a card, then search the discard pile for a Unicorn card and bring it directly into your Stable.
data.name: Kittencorn Burglar

data.text: When this card enters your Stable, you may move a Unicorn card from the Stable with the most Unicorns to the Stable with the fewest Unicorns.
data.name: Lady Justice Unicorn

data.text: When this card enters your Stable, you may DISCARD a card. If you do, bring a Baby Unicorn card from the Nursery directly into your Stable.
data.name: Mama Unicorn

data.text: When this card enters your Stable, SACRIFICE 2 cards. If this card is in your Stable at the beginning of your turn, you may choose a card from the discard pile and add it to your hand. If you do, skip your Draw phase.
data.name: Manticore Unicorn

data.text: Each player must pass their hand to the player on their left.
data.name: Merry-Go-Round

data.text: If this card would be sacrificed, destroyed, or returned to your hand, return it to the Nursery instead.
data.name: Million Dollar Baby Unicorn

data.text: If this card is sacrificed or destroyed, each player must SACRIFICE a card.
data.name: Mutually Assured Destructicorn

data.text: If this card is in your Stable at the beginning of your turn, you may bring a Baby Unicorn card from the Nursery directly into your Stable. If you do, do not play a card from your hand during your Action phase.
data.name: Nannycorn

data.text: Play this card when any other player tries to play a card. Stop that player's card from being played and send it to the discard pile.
data.name: Neigh - Angelic

data.text: Play this card when any other player tries to play a card. Stop that player's card from being played and send it to the discard pile.
data.name: Neigh - Demonic

data.text: When this card enters your Stable, name a type of card. If this card is in your Stable at the beginning of your turn, you may bring a card of that type from the discard pile directly into your Stable, then immediately end your turn.
data.name: Nightmare Pact

data.text: When this card enters your Stable, SACRIFICE 3 cards. If this card is in your Stable at the beginning of your turn, you may choose a Unicorn card from the discard pile and bring it directly into your Stable.
data.name: Nightmare Unicorn

data.text: DISCARD a card, then search the discard pile for 2 cards and add them to your hand.
data.name: Nightmare's Conjuring

data.text: When this card enters your Stable, SACRIFICE 2 Unicorn cards, then search the deck for a Unicorn card and bring it directly into your Stable. Shuffle the deck. If this card is sacrificed or destroyed, you may search the deck for a Unicorn card and bring it directly into your Stable.
data.name: Nine-Tailed Foxicorn

data.text: If this card is in your Stable at the beginning of your turn, each player that does not have a Magical Unicorn card in their Stable must DISCARD a card.
data.name: Nymphicorn

data.text: When any other player tries to play a Neigh card, you may DISCARD a card. If you do, return the Neigh card to that player's hand. That player cannot play a Neigh card this turn.
data.name: Objection

data.text: All of your Unicorns are considered Otters. Cards that affect Unicorn cards do not affect your Otters.
data.name: Otter Devastation

data.text: Each time a player would DISCARD a card, that player may DRAW a card instead.
data.name: Parallel Universicorn

data.text: Each time a player would SACRIFICE a card, that player must SACRIFICE 2 cards instead.
data.name: Patient Zero Unicorn

data.text: When this card leaves your Stable, you may choose any other player. Pull a card from that player's hand and add it to your hand.
data.name: Pickpocket Unicorn

data.text: When any other player tries to bring a Baby Unicorn card from the Nursery into their Stable, you may DISCARD a card. If you do, bring that *Baby Unicorn card directly into your Stable instead.
data.name: Pied Pipercorn

data.text: Flip one card at a time from the top of the deck into the discard pile until you find a Unicorn card. Bring that card directly into your Stable.
data.name: Prospecting

data.text: When this card enters your Stable, DISCARD a card. Each time you DISCARD a card, you may choose up to 2 other players. Each of those players must also DISCARD a card.
data.name: Puppetmaster Unicorn

data.text: DRAW 4 cards and DISCARD 4 cards.
data.name: Quid Pro Quo

data.text: One Unicorn's trash is another Raccoonicorns's hat.
data.name: Raccoonicorn

data.text: Choose any other player, DESTROY a Unicorn card in that player's Stable. You and that player may each DRAW a card.
data.name: Rainbow Bazooka

data.text: DRAW a card. If it's an Upgrade, Downgrade, or Unicorn card, bring that card directly into your Stable, then DRAW another card.
data.name: Rainbow Bridge

data.text: "I'm not a fox, I just look foxy!"
data.name: Red Pandacorn

data.text: Play this card when an effect would DESTROY a Unicorn card. Choose the target of that destruction effect.
data.name: Redirect

data.text: When this card enters your Stable, you may move a Downgrade card from your Stable to any other player's Stable.
data.name: Regifting Unicorn

data.text: When this card enters your Stable, SACRIFICE all Downgrade cards. You cannot play Magical Unicorn cards. If a Downgrade card enters your Stable, SACRIFICE this card.
data.name: Restricted Area

data.text: Each time any other player destroys a Unicorn card in your Stable, you may DESTROY a Unicorn card that in that player's Stable.
data.name: Retribution

data.text: If this card is in your Stable at the beginning of your turn, you may SACRIFICE it. If you do, DISCARD your hand and DRAW 5 cards.
data.name: Sacrificial Lambicorn

data.text: When this card enters your Stable, SACRIFICE a Unicorn card. When a Unicorn card in any other player's Stable would be sacrificed or returned to a player's hand, you may DISCARD up to 2 cards. If you DISCARD 1 card, add that card to your hand instead. If you DISCARD 2 cards, bring that card directly into your Stable.
data.name: Shadow Unicorn

data.text: Triggered effects of your Magical Unicorn cards do not activate.
data.name: Slothicorn

data.text: If this card is in your Stable at the beginning of your turn, you may DESTROY a Upgrade card. If you do, skip your Action Phase.
data.name: Sniper Unicorn

data.text: DISCARD any number of cards. Choose a number of players equal to the number of cards you discarded, then DESTROY a Unicorn card in each of their Stables.
data.name: Spring Cleaning

data.text: When this card enters your Stable, choose any other player. That player must show you their hand.
data.name: Spy Unicorn

data.text: "Hi, hungry! I'm Dad!"
data.name: Suburban Dadicorn

data.text: "Have you tried turning it off and then on again?"
data.name: Tech Supporticorn

data.text: Return a card in any player's Stable to that player's hand and DRAW a card.
data.name: Temporal Paradox

data.text: When this card enters your Stable, SACRIFICE a card. If a card in your Stable would be destroyed, you may DISCARD 2 cards instead.
data.name: The Rad Scientist Unicorn

data.text: Play this card when any other player tries to play a Magic card. Stop that card from being played and add it to your hand, then immediately play it.
data.name: Absorb and Reflect

data.text: When this card enters your Stable, you may move an Upgrade card from your Stable to any other player's Stable. If you do, STEAL an Upgrade card from that player's Stable.
data.name: Academicorn

data.name: Re-target

data.text: Trade hands with any other player.
data.name: Unfair Bargain

data.text: SACRIFICE a card, then DESTROY 2 cards.
data.name: Two-for-one

data.text: Choose any player. Move all of that player's Unicorn cards to the discard pile without triggering any of their effects, then bring the same number of Baby Unicorn cards from the Nursery directly into that player's Stable.
data.name: Unicorn Shrinkray

data.text: SACRIFICE or DESTROY an Upgrade or Downgrade card.
data.name: Targeted Destruction

data.text: Each player must DISCARD a card. Shuffle the discard pile into the deck.
data.name: Mystical Vortex

data.text: DRAW 3 cards and DISCARD a card.
data.name: Good Deal

data.text: Shuffle this card, your hand, and the discard pile into the deck. DRAW 5 cards.
data.name: Shake Up

data.text: Choose any player and look at that player's hand. Choose a card from that player's hand and add it to your hand.
data.name: Blatant Thievery

data.text: Each player must SACRIFICE all Upgrade and Downgrade cards. Shuffle the discard pile into the deck.
data.name: Reset Button

data.text: This card can only enter a Stable if there is a Basic Unicorn card in that Stable. If this card is in your Stable at the beginning of your turn, you may bring a Basic Unicorn card from your hand directly into your Stable.
data.name: Rainbow Mane

data.text: This card can only enter a Stable if there is a Basic Unicorn card in that Stable. If this card is in your Stable at the beginning of your turn, you may DRAW an extra card.
data.name: Extra Tail

data.text: If this card is in your Stable at the beginning of your turn, you may SACRIFICE a card. If you do, DESTROY a card.
data.name: Glitter Bomb

data.text: Cards you play cannot be Neigh'd.
data.name: Yay

data.text: If this card is in your Stable at the beginning of your turn, you may STEAL a Unicorn card. At the end of your turn, return that Unicorn card to the Stable from which you stole it.
data.name: Unicorn Lasso

data.text: Your Unicorn cards cannot be destroyed.
data.name: Rainbow Aura

data.text: If this card is in your Stable at the beginning of your turn, you may play 2 cards during your Action phase.
data.name: Double Dutch

data.text: If this card is in your Stable at the beginning of your turn, you may DISCARD 2 Unicorn cards. If you do, bring a Unicorn card directly from the discard pile into your Stable.
data.name: Summoning Ritual

data.text: Each time a Unicorn card enters or leaves your stable, DISCARD a card.
data.name: Barbed Wire

data.text: All of your Unicorns are considered Pandas. Cards that affect Unicorn cards do not affect your Pandas.
data.name: Pandamonium

data.text: If this card is in your Stable at the beginning of your turn, SACRIFICE a Unicorn card, then DRAW a card.
data.name: Sadistic Ritual

data.text: You cannot play Instant cards.
data.name: Slowdown

data.text: Your hand must be visible to all players at all times.
data.name: Nanny Cam

data.text: You cannot play Upgrade cards.
data.name: Broken Stable

data.text: Triggered effects of your Unicorn cards do not activate.
data.name: Blinding Light

data.text: If at any time you have more than 5 Unicorns in your Stable, SACRIFICE a Unicorn card.
data.name: Tiny Stable

data.text: Play this card when any other player tries to play a card. Stop that player's card from being played and send it to the discard pile.
data.name: Neigh

data.text: Play this card when any other player tries to play a card. Stop that player's card from being played and send it to the discard pile. This card cannot be Neigh'd.
data.name: Super Neigh

data.text: If this card is in your Stable at the beginning of your turn, you may SACRIFICE a Unicorn card. If you do, DESTROY a Unicorn card.
data.name: Unicorn Of Death

data.text: When this card enters your Stable, each player must DISCARD their hand.
data.name: Unicorn Of Pestilence

data.text: When this card enters your Stable, choose any number of players. DESTROY a Unicorn card in each of their Stables. Each of the chosen players may then DESTROY a Unicorn card in your Stable.
data.name: Unicorn Of War

data.text: Each player has a hand limit of 2 cards.
data.name: Unicorn Of Famine

data.text: SACRIFICE 4 Unicorn cards, then search the deck for 4 Unicorn cards and bring them directly into your Stable. Shuffle the deck.
data.name: Four Unicorns of the Apocalypse

data.text: SACRIFICE all of your Unicorn cards, then DESTROY a Unicorn card in each other player's Stable. Search the deck for an "Angel Unicorn" card and bring it directly into your Stable. Shuffle the deck.
data.name: Heavenly Smite

data.text: SACRIFICE all of your Unicorn cards, then DESTROY a Unicorn card in each other player's Stable. Search the deck for an "Extremely Fertile Unicorn" card and bring it directly into your Stable. Shuffle the deck.
data.name: Overpopulation

data.text: SACRIFICE any number of cards, then DESTROY the same number of cards.
data.name: Plague Of Death

data.text: SACRIFICE all of your Unicorn cards, then DESTROY a Unicorn card in each other player's Stable. Search the deck for a "Kittencorn" card and bring it directly into your Stable. Shuffle the deck.
data.name: Storm Of Cuteness

data.text: SACRIFICE all of your Unicorn cards, then DESTROY a Unicorn card in each other player's Stable. Search the deck for a "Unicorn Phoenix" card and bring it directly into your Stable. Shuffle the deck.
data.name: Fire And Brimstone

data.text: SACRIFICE all of your Unicorn cards, then DESTROY a Unicorn card in each other player's Stable. Search the deck for a "Zombie Unicorn" card and bring it directly into your Stable. Shuffle the deck.
data.name: Zombie Apocalypse

data.text: SACRIFICE all of your Unicorn cards, then DESTROY a Unicorn card in each other player's Stable. Search the deck for a "Llamacorn" card and bring it directly into your Stable. Shuffle the deck.
data.name: Llamapocalypse

data.text: SACRIFICE all of your Unicorn cards, then DESTROY a Unicorn card in each other player's Stable. Search the deck for an "Extremely Destructive Unicorn" card and bring it directly into your Stable. Shuffle the deck.
data.name: Ultimate Destruction

data.text: At least it's not a lower back tattoo...
data.name: Unicorn With A Dragon Tattoo

data.text: It's not a costume. It's a way of life.
data.name: Dragon Cosplay Unicorn

data.text: As long as this card is in your Stable, your Unicorns cannot be destroyed or affected by any card with "Dragon" in its name.
data.name: Dragon Slayer Unicorn

data.text: When this card enters your Stable, you may search the deck for a card with "Dragon" in its name. Add it to your hand, then shuffle the deck.
data.name: Dragon Tamer Unicorn

data.text: When this card enters your Stable, you may move an UPGRADE or DOWNGRADE card from any player's Stable to another player's Stable.
data.name: Dragon Rider Unicorn

data.text: If this card leaves your Stable, you may DESTROY a Unicorn.
data.name: Dragon Unicorn

data.text: DESTROY a Unicorn
data.name: Dragon’s Breath

data.text: SACRIFICE or DESTROY an Upgrade or Downgrade card.
data.name: Dragon’s Fire

data.text: Each player must SACRIFICE all Upgrade and Downgrade cards.
data.name: Dragon-scorched Stables

data.text: Search the deck for a Magic card. Play it immediately, then shuffle the deck.
data.name: Dragon Kiss

data.text: As long as this card is in your Stable, Downgrades in your Stable have no effect.
data.name: Dragon’s Blessing

data.text: If this card is in your Stable at the beginning of your turn, you must DISCARD a card.
data.name: Dragon’s Curse

data.text: If this card is in your Stable at the beginning of your turn, you must shuffle a Unicorn from your stable into the deck, then DRAW an extra card.
data.name: Dragon Skies

data.text: Play this card when any player tries to play a card. Stop that player's card from coming into play and send it to the discard pile instead.
data.name: Neigh, Foul Beast

data.text: If this card would be sacrificed, destroyed, or returned to your hand, return it to the Nursery instead.
data.name: Baby Unicorn (Shotgun)

data.text: If this card would be sacrificed, destroyed, or returned to your hand, return it to the Nursery instead.
data.name: Baby Unicorn (Grenade)

data.text: If this card would be sacrificed, destroyed, or returned to your hand, return it to the Nursery instead.
data.name: Baby Unicorn (Upside Down)

data.text: If this card would be sacrificed, destroyed, or returned to your hand, return it to the Nursery instead.
data.name: Baby Unicorn (Garbage)

data.text: If this card would be sacrificed, destroyed, or returned to your hand, return it to the Nursery instead.
data.name: Baby Unicorn (Snake)

data.text: If this card would be sacrificed, destroyed, or returned to your hand, return it to the Nursery instead.
data.name: Baby Unicorn (Cannibal)

data.text: #livingfortheweekend
data.name: Wasted White Unicorn

data.text: Sometimes a horse just needs to feel a little special.
data.name: Horse With A Dildo

data.text: It's 4:20 somewhere.
data.name: Stoner Unicorn

data.text: The single life.
data.name: Single Unicorn

data.text: When this card enters your stable, you may search the deck for a "twinkicorn" card. add it to your hand, then shuffle the deck.
data.name: Bear Daddy Unicorn

data.text: When this card enters your stable, you may search the deck for a "Bear daddy unicorn" card. add it to your hand, then shuffle the deck.
data.name: Twinkicorn

data.text: When this card enters your stable, you may look at the top three cards in the deck, then return them in the same order.
data.name: Straight But Curious Unicorn

data.text: When this card enters your stable, each player must sacrifice a unicorn.
data.name: Cult Leader Unicorn

data.text: You must have a basic unicorn in your stable to play this card. If this card is in your stable at the beginning of your turn, you choose any player. that player must discard a card.
data.name: The Bitchiest Unicorn

data.text: If this card is in your Stable at the beginning of your turn, you may trade it for a Unicorn in any player's Stable.
data.name: Polyamorous Unicorn

data.text: When this card enters your stable, move a basic unicorn from any player's stable to your stable. If this card leaves your stable, move the unicorn back to its original stable.
data.name: Naked Narwhal

data.text: When this card enters your stable, move a baby unicorn from any player's stable to your stable. If this card leaves your stable, move the unicorn back to its original stable.
data.name: Free Candy Unicorn

data.text: When this card enters your stable, move a unicorn from any player's stable to your stable. If this card leaves your stable, move the unicorn back to its original stable. If this card is sacrificed or destroyed, return it to your hand.
data.name: Horny Flying Unicorn

data.text: Choose any player. that player must discard a card. give another player a card from their hand, then destroy a unicorn.
data.name: Fuck, Marry, Kill

data.text: Serach the deck for a NSFW card. add it to your hand, then shuffle the deck.
data.name: Dirty Mind

data.text: Choose any player. That player must skip their next turn.
data.name: Unicorn Hangover

data.text: Draw a card for each unicorn over three in your stable.
data.name: Unicorgy

data.text: Each player must sacrifice a card and discard their entire hand. Shuffle the discard pile into the deck, then deal five cards to each player.
data.name: Rainbow Shitstorm

data.text: Each player must return a baby unicorn from their stable to the nursery.
data.name: Safe Sex

data.text: If this card is in your stable at the beginning of your turn, you may take a card at random from any player's hand instead of drawing a card.
data.name: Pony Play

data.text: If this card is in your stable at the beginning of your turn, you may move a unicorn from any player's stable to another player's stable. you cannot move the unicorn into your own stable.
data.name: Dominatrix Whip

data.text: If one of your unicorns would be sacrificed or destroyed, you may sacrifice this card instead.
data.name: Blow Up Unicorn

data.text: If this card is in your stable at the beginning of your turn, discard a card.
data.name: Autoerotic Asphyxiation

data.text: As long as this card is in your stable, your hand limit is three cards.
data.name: Unicorn Butt Plug

data.text: Play this card when any player tries to play a card. Stop that player's card from coming into play and send it to the discard pile instead.
data.name: Hell Neigh!

data.text: Play this card when any player tries to play a card. Stop that player's card from coming into play and send it to the discard pile instead.
data.name: Neigh, Bitch!

data.text: Play this card when any player tries to play a card. Stop that player's card from coming into play and send it to the discard pile instead. That player must discard a card.
data.name: Neigh, Motherfucker!

data.text: If this card would be sacrificed, destroyed, or returned to your hand, return it to the Nursery instead.
data.name: Baby Unicorn (Sparkles)

data.text: If this card would be sacrificed, destroyed, or returned to your hand, return it to the Nursery instead.
data.name: Baby Unicorn (Flowers)

data.text: Ice cream always saves the day!
data.name: Horse With An Ice Cream Cone

data.text: Look, Mom! I'm a unicorn!
data.name: Innocent Bunnicorn

data.text: When this card enters your Stable, each player must choose a card from their hand if they have at least 1 card in their hand and pass it to the player on their left.
data.name: The Magical Pugicorn

data.text: This card cannot be destroyed by triggered card effects.
data.name: The Tiniest Unicorn

data.text: When this card enters your Stable, each player must SACRIFICE a Unicorn card, then DRAW a card.
data.name: Cotton Candy Llamacorn

data.text: When this card enters your Stable, choose any number of players. DRAW cards equal to the number of chosen players. Each of those players may DRAW a card.
data.name: Unicorn Rainbow Princess

data.text: When this card enters your Stable, you may bring an Upgrade card from your hand directly into your Stable.
data.name: Glitter Unicorn

data.text: When this card enters your Stable, each player must SACRIFICE a card. If this card would be sacrificed or destroyed, return it to your hand instead.
data.name: Adorable Flying Unicorn

data.text: Choose any player. Move up to 3 Unicorn cards from that player's Stable to the discard pile without triggering any of their effects, then bring the same number of Baby Unicorn cards from the Nursery directly into that player's Stable.
data.name: A Cute Attack

data.text: Choose a Unicorn from each player's Stable. Shuffle them together, then deal them out face down. Those unicorns come directly into play in the new players' Stables.
data.name: Sharing Is Caring

data.text: Choose any player. That player must skip their next turn.
data.name: Unicorn Nap

data.text: If this card is in your Stable at the beginning of your turn, you may bring a Baby Unicorn card from the Nursery directly into your Stable. If you do, skip your Action phase.
data.name: Special Delivery

data.text: If this card is in your Stable at the beginning of your turn, you may DRAW 3 cards. If you do, immediately skip to your End of Turn phase.
data.name: Rainbow Sprinkles

data.text: All of your Upgrade cards affect each player's Stable.
data.name: Cupcakes For Everyone

data.text: Your hand limit is 3 cards.
data.name: Tiny Hooves

data.text: Play this card when any other player tries to play a card. Stop that player's card from being played and send it to the discard pile. Both you and that player may draw a card.
data.name: Neigh, Thank You
